sub_title: Head of IT Western Europe, Sales Excellence & Analytics EU at Viatris
summary:
Information technology partner for Viatris Developed Markets Northern & Western Europe cluster with solid experience in managing stakeholder expectations plus shaping thinking on how technology solutions can support commercial goals.  IT executive with more than 13 years of experience working across geographies and in cross-functional projects, giving him all-round skills in supporting business clients’ goals using technology. He leverages his unique blend of commercial processes knowledge, business acumen, portfolio management and strategy development experiences to create commercial value through leveraging cutting-edge technology solutions.

Joined Pfizer in 2010, I held a Regional Solutions Manager role working closely with commercial departments and enabling functions for several projects. I was part of project team for early stages of HCP Portal in Turkey, led many brand website projects as a PM, leading several IT related initiatives and projects like Direct-to-Pharmacy, Direct-to-Hospital and Digital Hub initiatives for Poland. I worked as a Regional Operations Delivery Manager in BT/I organization responsable for ten markets in Central and Eastern Europe Region. As being an ODM I was responsible for the region, I managed Pfizer Site Services and Service Desk organizations in multiple markets, lead a team of twenty+ Helpdesk agents. 

I also delivered advance digital marketing capabilities to Pfizer Central Europe markets, Israel and Greece to enable the delivery of increasingly meaningful customer experiences. Effectively managed the initial delivery of Healthcare Professional Portals, Virtual Customer Communications scale up plans, deployment and operationalization of Remote Detailing service offerings and smooth transition of E-mail communication channels to different providers.

I also owned and led the entire concurrent Pfizer Upjohn divestiture activities and projects from IT perspective through to successful completion for UK, Germany, France, Belgium, Turkey and Russia, a region of $606 million yearly sales.

Prior to joining Pfizer in 2010, worked for Garanti Bank (equal strategic partners with BBVA) and Merck Sharp & Dohme in multiple roles.

I received my B.S. degree in Computer Science from Yıldız Technical University.
